comment: Full sweet aroma of cherries and banana bread. Spicy on the tongue with wood and cinnamon
Rosemary. Pine. Oak. Botanical. Italian Herbs.

Nose: Oak, vanilla, brown sugar. Black pepper, clove, cardamom.  Tart cherry.  Vegetal - dill, thyme, basil.  Barnyard.

Palate: oak, vanilla, sugar.  Creamy - cream cheese frosting.  Dill, thyme, cinnamon, clove, cardamom.   Bubblegum.  Barnyard hay - almost reminds me of a brett beer.
Piney and smooth, this Sazerac was a standout at the last WhiskeyFest. The gin among ryes
